languages.text: {n}На мостике царят беготня и хаос — офицеры отчаянно стучат пальцами по рунам когитаторов, операторы раздают команды в шипящие вокс-установки, блюстители проверяют оружие. В этом беспорядке удивительно обычно выглядит лишь Главный кормчий — лицо вечно хмурого Равора не способно вместить еще больше сумрачного недовольства.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, я рад, что вы добрались сюда цел{mf|ым|ой} и невредим{mf|ым|ой}".

traits.locale_text: {n}На мостике царят беготня и хаос — офицеры отчаянно стучат пальцами по рунам когитаторов, операторы раздают команды в шипящие вокс-установки, блюстители проверяют оружие. В этом беспорядке удивительно обычно выглядит лишь Главный кормчий — лицо вечно хмурого Равора не способно вместить еще больше сумрачного недовольства.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, я рад, что вы добрались сюда цел{mf|ым|ой} и невредим{mf|ым|ой}".

languages.text: {n}Turmoil reigns on the bridge, with officers running about frantically tapping the cogitator runes, operators issuing commands into hissing vox-casters, and enforcers brandishing and checking their weapons. Only the Master Helmsman looks curiously unperturbed — Ravor's ever-scowling face clearly cannot hold any more grim dissatisfaction.{/n} "I'm glad you've made it here in one piece, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}На мостике царят беготня и хаос — офицеры отчаянно стучат пальцами по рунам когитаторов, операторы раздают команды в шипящие вокс-установки, блюстители проверяют оружие. В этом беспорядке удивительно обычно выглядит лишь Главный кормчий — лицо вечно хмурого Равора не способно вместить еще больше сумрачного недовольства.{/n} "Ваша Светлость, я рад, что вы добрались сюда цел{mf|ым|ой} и невредим{mf|ым|ой}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Turmoil reigns on the bridge, with officers running about frantically tapping the cogitator runes, operators issuing commands into hissing vox-casters, and enforcers brandishing and checking their weapons. Only the Master Helmsman looks curiously unperturbed — Ravor's ever-scowling face clearly cannot hold any more grim dissatisfaction.{/n} "I'm glad you've made it here in one piece, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}There is chaos on the bridge, with officers running around and frantically tapping the cogitator runes, operators issuing commands into hissing vox-units, and enforcers checking their weapons. Only Master Helmsman looks surprisingly unperturbed as Ravor's perpetually scowling face cannot hold more grim dissatisfaction. {/n} "I am glad you are still alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Chaos reigns on the bridge, with officers running about frantically tapping the cogitator runes, operators issuing commands into hissing vox-units, and enforcers brandishing and checking their weapons. Only the Master Helmsman looks curiously unperturbed; Ravor's ever scowling face clearly cannot hold any more grim dissatisfaction. {/n} "I am glad you are still alive, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

Only the Master Helmsman looks curiously unperturbed — Ravor's ever-scowling face clearly cannot hold any more grim dissatisfaction.{/n} "I'm glad you've made it here in one piece, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}Turmoil reigns on the bridge, with officers running about frantically tapping the cogitator runes, operators issuing commands into hissing vox-casters, and enforcers brandishing and checking their weapons. Only the Master Helmsman looks curiously unperturbed — Ravor's ever-scowling face clearly cannot hold any more grim dissatisfaction.{/n} "I'm glad you've made it here in one piece, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}El desorden impera en el puente. Los oficiales corren de un lado a otro, tocando frenéticamente las runas de los cogitadores. Los operadores dan órdenes a siseantes voco amplificadores y el personal de seguridad blande y revisa sus armas. El único que parece impasible es el maestro timonel, porque su eterno fruncimiento de ceño no puede expresar más insatisfacción.{/n} «Me alegro de ver que mi{mf|lord|lady} sigue de una pieza».
languages.original_text: {n}Turmoil reigns on the bridge, with officers running about frantically tapping the cogitator runes, operators issuing commands into hissing vox-casters, and enforcers brandishing and checking their weapons. Only the Master Helmsman looks curiously unperturbed — Ravor's ever-scowling face clearly cannot hold any more grim dissatisfaction.{/n} "I'm glad you've made it here in one piece, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El desorden impera en el puente. Los oficiales corren de un lado a otro, tocando frenéticamente las runas de los cogitadores. Los operadores dan órdenes a siseantes voco amplificadores y el personal de seguridad blande y revisa sus armas. El único que parece impasible es el maestro timonel, porque su eterno fruncimiento de ceño no puede expresar más insatisfacción.{/n} «Me alegro de ver que mi{mf|lord|lady} sigue de una pieza».

languages.text: {n}渾沌がブリッジを支配する中、士官たちは走り回って必死に考算機のルーンを接続し、オペレーターはシューと音を立てる音声通信送受信装置に向かって指示を出し、エンフォーサーは武器を振るいつつ、武器の状態の確認も並行して行っている。マスター・ヘルムスマンだけは、不思議なほど平静を装っていた。ラヴォアのいつもぶすっとした顔は、見るからに不機嫌が爆発しそうな様子だ。{/n}「ご無事でここにたどり着かれて何よりです、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}Turmoil reigns on the bridge, with officers running about frantically tapping the cogitator runes, operators issuing commands into hissing vox-casters, and enforcers brandishing and checking their weapons. Only the Master Helmsman looks curiously unperturbed — Ravor's ever-scowling face clearly cannot hold any more grim dissatisfaction.{/n} "I'm glad you've made it here in one piece, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}渾沌がブリッジを支配する中、士官たちは走り回って必死に考算機のルーンを接続し、オペレーターはシューと音を立てる音声通信送受信装置に向かって指示を出し、エンフォーサーは武器を振るいつつ、武器の状態の確認も並行して行っている。マスター・ヘルムスマンだけは、不思議なほど平静を装っていた。ラヴォアのいつもぶすっとした顔は、見るからに不機嫌が爆発しそうな様子だ。{/n}「ご無事でここにたどり着かれて何よりです、陛下」

languages.text: {n}舰桥上一片骚乱。所有军官都在四处奔忙，疯狂敲击着沉思者上的符文；操作员朝嘶嘶作响的通讯器发出各种各样的指令；执法者则在忙着检查武器。只有舵手长雷沃看起来完全没受影响，他的脸平时就阴云密布，此刻也依然无比严峻，似乎与平时毫无区别。{/n}“真高兴你还活蹦乱跳，船长老大。”
languages.original_text: {n}Turmoil reigns on the bridge, with officers running about frantically tapping the cogitator runes, operators issuing commands into hissing vox-casters, and enforcers brandishing and checking their weapons. Only the Master Helmsman looks curiously unperturbed — Ravor's ever-scowling face clearly cannot hold any more grim dissatisfaction.{/n} "I'm glad you've made it here in one piece, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}舰桥上一片骚乱。所有军官都在四处奔忙，疯狂敲击着沉思者上的符文；操作员朝嘶嘶作响的通讯器发出各种各样的指令；执法者则在忙着检查武器。只有舵手长雷沃看起来完全没受影响，他的脸平时就阴云密布，此刻也依然无比严峻，似乎与平时毫无区别。{/n}“真高兴你还活蹦乱跳，船长老大。”
{n}舰桥上一片骚乱。所有军官都在四处奔忙，疯狂敲击着沉思者上的符文；操作员朝嘶嘶作响的通讯器发出各种各样的指令；执法者则在忙着检查武器。只有舵手长雷沃看起来完全没受影响，他的脸平时就阴云密布，此刻也依然无比严峻，似乎与平时毫无区别。{/n}“真高兴你还活着，船长老大。”

languages.text: {n}Auf der Brücke herrscht Aufruhr. Offiziere laufen hin und her und tippen hektisch auf die Cogitator-Runen. Andere brüllen Befehle in zischende Vox-Transmitter. Enforcer laden und überprüfen ihre Waffen. Nur der Hauptsteuermann wirkt eigenartig unbeirrt – Ravors stets mürrisches Gesicht kann offenbar keine noch größere Unzufriedenheit ausdrücken.{/n} "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr es in einem Stück geschafft habt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}Turmoil reigns on the bridge, with officers running about frantically tapping the cogitator runes, operators issuing commands into hissing vox-casters, and enforcers brandishing and checking their weapons. Only the Master Helmsman looks curiously unperturbed — Ravor's ever-scowling face clearly cannot hold any more grim dissatisfaction.{/n} "I'm glad you've made it here in one piece, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf der Brücke herrscht Aufruhr. Offiziere laufen hin und her und tippen hektisch auf die Cogitator-Runen. Andere brüllen Befehle in zischende Vox-Transmitter. Enforcer laden und überprüfen ihre Waffen. Nur der Hauptsteuermann wirkt eigenartig unbeirrt – Ravors stets mürrisches Gesicht kann offenbar keine noch größere Unzufriedenheit ausdrücken.{/n} "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr es in einem Stück geschafft habt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

{n}Auf der Brücke herrscht Aufruhr. Offiziere laufen hin und her und tippen hektisch auf die Cogitator-Runen. Andere brüllen Befehle in zischende Vox-Transmitter. Enforcers laden und überprüfen ihre Waffen. Nur der Hauptsteuermann wirkt eigenartig unbeirrt — Ravors ohnehin stets mürrisches Gesicht kann offenbar keine noch größere Unzufriedenheit ausdrücken.{/n} "Ich bin froh, dass Ihr noch lebt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Sur la passerelle règne la confusion la plus totale ; d'un côté, les officiers tapotent frénétiquement les runes du cogitateur, tandis que de l'autre, plusieurs opérateurs braillent des ordres dans des émetteurs vox grésillant. Les prévôts, quant à eux, ont dégainé leurs armes, qu'ils vérifient méticuleusement comme dans l'attente d'une quelconque confrontation. Seul le maître timonier Ravor, le visage renfrogné comme à son habitude, semble rester imperturbable.{/n} « Content de vous voir en un seul morceau, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}Turmoil reigns on the bridge, with officers running about frantically tapping the cogitator runes, operators issuing commands into hissing vox-casters, and enforcers brandishing and checking their weapons. Only the Master Helmsman looks curiously unperturbed — Ravor's ever-scowling face clearly cannot hold any more grim dissatisfaction.{/n} "I'm glad you've made it here in one piece, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sur la passerelle règne la confusion la plus totale ; d'un côté, les officiers tapotent frénétiquement les runes du cogitateur, tandis que de l'autre, plusieurs opérateurs braillent des ordres dans des émetteurs vox grésillant. Les prévôts, quant à eux, ont dégainé leurs armes, qu'ils vérifient méticuleusement comme dans l'attente d'une quelconque confrontation. Seul le maître timonier Ravor, le visage renfrogné comme à son habitude, semble rester imperturbable.{/n} « Content de vous voir en un seul morceau, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Köprüye karmaşa hâkim. Subaylar telaşe içinde kavramsayar rünlerine basıyor, operatörler cızırdayan voksyayarlardan emirler yağdırıyor, infazcılar ise silahlarını sağa sola sallayıp kontrol ediyor. Yalnızca Başserdümen tuhaf derecede soğukkanlı. Ravor'un yüz ifadesi, azami haşinlik seviyesinde ve hiçbir hoşnutsuzluk bunu daha da artıramaz gibi duruyor.{/n} "Tek parça hâlinde buraya ulaşabilmiş olmanız sevindirici {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}Turmoil reigns on the bridge, with officers running about frantically tapping the cogitator runes, operators issuing commands into hissing vox-casters, and enforcers brandishing and checking their weapons. Only the Master Helmsman looks curiously unperturbed — Ravor's ever-scowling face clearly cannot hold any more grim dissatisfaction.{/n} "I'm glad you've made it here in one piece, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
